input.description:
A TrueSight event of the form:
<event> <cell-name>bao1</cell-name> <class-name>PATROL_EV</class-name> <date><![CDATA[20180419140507.000000+330]]></date> <msg><![CDATA[ServiceStatus for NT_SERVICES/SERVICES_TBS is in ALARM current value is 3.000000]]></msg> <p-origin><![CDATA[NT_SERVICES.SERVICES_TBS.ServiceStatus]]></p-origin> <mc-service><![CDATA[TBS]]></mc-service> <mc-origin-sev><![CDATA[4]]></mc-origin-sev> <event-identification-type><![CDATA[Internal]]></event-identification-type> <mc-tool-class><![CDATA[PATROL Agent]]></mc-tool-class> <p-owner><![CDATA[Patrol]]></p-owner> <p-class><![CDATA[11]]></p-class> <mc-parameter-value><![CDATA[3.000000]]></mc-parameter-value> <mc-parameter><![CDATA[ServiceStatus]]></mc-parameter> <mc-modhist><![CDATA[[bao1]]]></mc-modhist> <p-expectancy><![CDATA[STORED]]></p-expectancy> <p-instance><![CDATA[SERVICES_TBS]]></p-instance> <mc-origin-key><![CDATA[63966]]></mc-origin-key> <mc-object><![CDATA[SERVICES_TBS]]></mc-object> <mc-tool-time><![CDATA[1524126907]]></mc-tool-time> <p-source-id><![CDATA[63966]]></p-source-id> <mc-smc-impact><![CDATA[IMPACTING]]></mc-smc-impact> <mc-host-address><![CDATA[10.17.78.30]]></mc-host-address> <date-reception><![CDATA[1524126907]]></date-reception> <p-agent><![CDATA[clm-aus-009801.bmc.com]]></p-agent> <p-handler><![CDATA[Patrol]]></p-handler> <p-agent-port><![CDATA[3181]]></p-agent-port> <p-agent-version><![CDATA[V11.0.00i]]></p-agent-version> <p-type><![CDATA[ALARM]]></p-type> <mc-local-reception-time><![CDATA[1524126967]]></mc-local-reception-time> <mc-location><![CDATA[bmc.com]]></mc-location> <mc-tool><![CDATA[clm-aus-009801:3181]]></mc-tool> <mc-origin-class><![CDATA[PATROL Agent]]></mc-origin-class> <p-args><![CDATA[[Alarm #2, global, ServiceStatus, NT_SERVICES.SERVICES_TBS, 3, 3.00, 3]]]></p-args> <mc-host><![CDATA[clm-aus-009801.bmc.com]]></mc-host> <mc-event-category><![CDATA[AVAILABILITY_MANAGEMENT]]></mc-event-category> <p-catalog><![CDATA[0]]></p-catalog> <itsm-company><![CDATA[Calbro Services]]></itsm-company> <mc-ueid><![CDATA[clm-aus-009801@10.17.78.30:3181.1524126824.63966]]></mc-ueid> <mc-arrival-time><![CDATA[1524126967]]></mc-arrival-time> <severity><![CDATA[CRITICAL]]></severity> <mc-history><![CDATA[[bao1:18875]]]></mc-history> <p-status><![CDATA[OPEN]]></p-status> <p-application><![CDATA[NT_SERVICES]]></p-application> <mc-origin><![CDATA[clm-aus-009801:3181]]></mc-origin> <itsm-incident-status><![CDATA[Assigned]]></itsm-incident-status> <mc-date-modification><![CDATA[1524126967]]></mc-date-modification> <mc-event-subcategory><![CDATA[APPLICATION]]></mc-event-subcategory> <mc-host-class><![CDATA[NT6.0 Service Pack 2]]></mc-host-class> <mc-object-class><![CDATA[NT_SERVICES]]></mc-object-class> <p-agent-address><![CDATA[10.17.78.30]]></p-agent-address> <mc-incident-time><![CDATA[1524126907]]></mc-incident-time> <itsm-incident-id><![CDATA[INC000000000128]]></itsm-incident-id> <p-node><![CDATA[clm-aus-009801.bmc.com]]></p-node> </event>

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <xsl:copy-of select="//*[name() = '${event source type}']/Mappings/EventMappings" /> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

<xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" xmlns:xalan="http://xml.apache.org/xalan" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:variable name="incoming">${event data}</xsl:variable> <xsl:template match="/"> <event> <metaData> <xsl:apply-templates select="//mapping[destination[@class = 'metaData']]" mode="Mapped" /> </metaData> <situationData> <xsl:apply-templates select="//mapping[destination[@class = 'situationData']]" mode="Mapped" /> </situationData> <sourceData> <xsl:apply-templates select="//mapping[destination[@class = 'sourceData']]" mode="Mapped" /> </sourceData> <reporterData> <xsl:apply-templates select="//mapping[destination[@class = 'reporterData']]" mode="Mapped" /> </reporterData> <metricsData> <xsl:apply-templates select="//mapping[destination[@class = 'metricsData']]" mode="Mapped" /> </metricsData> <itsmData> <xsl:apply-templates select="xalan:nodeset($incoming)//event[starts-with(name(), 'incident')]" mode="ITSM" /> </itsmData> <extendedData> <nameValueList> <xsl:apply-templates select="xalan:nodeset($incoming)//event/*" mode="Extended"> <xsl:with-param name="mappings"> <xsl:copy-of select="." /> </xsl:with-param> </xsl:apply-templates> </nameValueList> </extendedData> </event> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="mapping" mode="Mapped"> <xsl:variable name="src" select="source/text()" /> <xsl:variable name="elemName" select="destination/text()" /> <xsl:element name="{$elemName}"> <xsl:value-of select="xalan:nodeset($incoming)//*[name() = $src]/text()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </xsl:element> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="@*|node()" mode="Extended"> <xsl:param name="mappings" /> <xsl:variable name="values" select="$mappings" /> <xsl:choose> <xsl:when test="not(contains($values, name()))"> <nameValue> <name> <xsl:value-of select="name()" disable-output-escaping="no" /> </name> <value> <xsl:value-of select="." disable-output-escaping="no" /> </value> </nameValue> </xsl:when> </xsl:choose> </xsl:template> <xsl:template match="@*|node()" mode="ITSM"> <xsl:copy-of select="." /> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

documentation.description: Given a TrueSight event, translate to common event model format.
